channel.title: Need help with client
channel.description: Hi, I keep getting stuck at "Connecting to update server" whenever I try to launch my client, I'm trying to use corruption x client with corruption x source. I am 100% sure my server is online and ports are opened correctly.

item.title: Need help with client

item.description:
@tekstyled555 wrote:

Hi, I keep getting stuck at “Connecting to update server” whenever I try to launch my client, I’m trying to use corruption x client with corruption x source. I am 100% sure my server is online and ports are opened correctly.
